column1: On this week's Coronavirus Catch-up business reporter Richard Morgan explains how businesses have been affected by the pandemic and answers your questions.Have you got questions about furlough?  Have you flights booked this year and want to know your options?We'll have the latest on any developments and what they may mean for you
column2: as well as the answers to your questions. Coronavirus Catch-up will be live with the latest updates on Thursday at 19:00 GMT on the BBC News NI website
column3: BBC iPlayer and the BBC News NI Facebook page.
